title: Systemic Amnesia
outcome: Entire families and groups find their personal histories wiped from the BCI system, making them non-persons unable to access services. As they gather and protest, activists uncover old BCI prototype code at the root of the mass erasures.

events.description: Several families and individuals discover they have been erased from the BCI system: locked out of housing, work, and transport, they stage desperate public protests downtown.
Activists and journalists uncover proof that the erasures match hidden rules from archived BCI pilot code that Halden deployed in 2022, sparking widespread outrage.
Makeshift camps of 'Vanished' citizens grow as more people are erased, and aid efforts from unaffected neighbors begin, igniting citywide solidarity drives.
Council factions clash over responsibility: Directorate blames inconsistent patching, Harmonists urge full restoration, Innovators propose a risky system reset to recover lost histories.
Under mounting pressure, the Council announces an urgent audit to restore erased citizens, but trust in the system reaches a historic low as the city teeters on the edge of chaos.
